alert.note: Alert for Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 3:50PM MST until January 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulation through Saturday morning up to 3 inches. An additional 3 to 6 inches, with locally up to 8 inches is expected Saturday afternoon through Monday morning. * WHERE...Utah Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected, especially Saturday afternoon into Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may mix with rain at times along valley floors Saturday evening into Sunday morning. Anywhere this occurs will see a reduction in snow totals.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
